projects.title: Galtaker
projects.description: Sokoban-inspired Unity game made for a game jam. Features localization with Crowdin, Steam achievements and an art gallery.
projects.longDescription:
Galtaker is a Sokoban-inspired puzzle game I made in Unity for the DSV game jam together with [Nora G](https://www.artstation.com/noroalia) (we won ðŸ¥³). We have since then expanded the game with plans to release it on Steam.

The game features localization with Crowdin, Steam achievements through Steamworks and an art gallery, and has 15 levels. It has a built-in level editor, and the game is fully playable with a keyboard, controller or touch screen.

projects.title: fruitwork (game engine)
projects.description: Game engine written in C++ using the Simple DirectMedia Layer library. Features a scene system, a physics engine and multiple test scenes.
projects.longDescription:
fruitwork is a game engine written in C++ using the SDL library. It was developed for around a month during my C/C++ course at Stockholm University. Doing everything from scratch was a great learning experience, and making a new, even better version of the engine is something I would like to do in the future.

The engine features a scene system, a physics engine and multiple test scenes. It has a solid UI system with support for labels, input fields, buttons and more.

projects.title: Dishooks
projects.description: C# wrapper for the Discord webhook API. Multi-platform support and 100% coverage; attachments, embeds, TTS and custom avatars / usernames.
projects.longDescription:
Dishooks is a C# wrapper for the Discord webhook API. It has 100% coverage of the API, including attachments, embeds, TTS, custom avatars / usernames and message editing/deletion. Since everything is done through webhooks there is no requirement or need for a server or CDN.

Dishooks is a Unity asset and is available on the Unity Asset Store, with plans to maybe release it on NuGet in the future.

projects.title: svb!catch
projects.description: Web game based on osu!. Contains 200+ full beatmaps with music, 8 mods, online profiles and a custom difficulty system.
projects.longDescription:
svb!catch is a browser rhythm game based made with plain JavaScript and an Express.js backend. Any beatmap available in osu! can be played in svb!catch, and the game contains five unique types of modifiers to spice up the gameplay.

svb!catch features online profiles via Discord OAuth 2.0, a custom difficulty system and online leaderboards. To optimize the game experience and performance, all thumbnails are automatically cropped and beatmaps are streamed from the server once you play or preview them.

projects.title: SaltBot
projects.description: Discord bot made with discord.js used in over 10,000 guilds. Features 90+ commands, fictive battles, image manipulation and more.
projects.longDescription:
SaltBot is a Discord bot made with discord.js. It has over 90 commands, focusing on fun/useful stuff like fictive battles, image manipulation, data retrieval and more. It was used in over 10,000 guilds and peaked around 60,000 commands processed daily, but was discontinued because of lack time.

It is written using TypeScript and has a modular command system, allowing for easy command creation and modification.

projects.title: SVB
projects.description: News website based on SVT. Features online profiles with different privileged roles, game leaderboards and more.
projects.longDescription:
SVB is a news website based on SVT, made during my web development and web server programming courses. It features a custom made user system with different privileged roles to publish articles, and uses Discord OAuth2 to allow users to login and authenticate.

It is created using Express.js and Vue, and uses a MySQL database to store user data.

projects.title: SajberSim
projects.description: Visual novel engine made in Unity. Features a custom scripting language, Steam workshop support, a debugger and more.
projects.longDescription:
SajberSim is a visual novel engine and browser made in Unity. It allows users to create full visual novels with custom characters, backgrounds, music and more using its custom scripting language.

It has Steam Workshop support and a built-in script debugger to ease the development process, and a built-in novel browser to allow users to easily download and play other people's novels.

projects.title: SajberRoyale
projects.description: 3D battle royale game made in Unity. Features a custom map with 35+ unique rooms, online statistics and 100+ modelled assets.
projects.longDescription:
SajberRoyale is a 3D battle royale game made in Unity using the Photon Unity Networking asset with support for up to 10 players per match. It was made in a group of three 3D artists and me as the programmer and took around 3 months to create.

SajberRoyale contains a custom made weapon system, an emote wheel and online statistics shared with the [svb!catch](#project-svbcatch) API.

projects.title: IKIMONO
projects.description: Pet simulator for Android made in Unity. Includes minigames, offline needs and a custom saving system.

projects.title: Digital Deception
projects.description: An educational '90s internet simulator where you work as an email moderator to detect junk emails.

projects.title: SaltBot-Gacha
projects.description: Gacha module for SaltBot, inspired by Mudae. Features rolls, wishlisting, loot boxes and more. Discontinued and never published.

projects.title: Jam Maestro
projects.description: Cooking/mixing-type game made in 2 days using Unity. It features online leaderboards, 17 ingredients and 6 character reactions.

projects.title: 3DR
projects.description: A 3D environment made in Unreal Engine 5 for the [3D rendering](https://www.su.se/sok-kurser-och-program/ib150n-1.496964) course at Stockholm University.

projects.title: Charge the beat
projects.description: Unity taiko rhythm game made for a game jam. Full support for osu!taiko beatmaps and up to 4 players.

projects.title: Galhooks
projects.description: A simple web server to automatically fetch, save and display Unity Cloud Builds.

projects.title: This website
projects.description: The website you're currently on. It's made with HTML, JS and SCSS, and the projects are saved with JSON.

projects.title: Interrupted Silence
projects.description: Tiny application that automatically plays a random sound at random intervals. Made for [babehog](https://www.twitch.tv/babehog).

projects.title: auto-starquiz
projects.description: A simple script that automatically answers questions in the MSP2 minigame Star Quiz. Monitors the game web socket and comparing data to a known answer list.

projects.title: mario-knows
projects.description: A silly Node.js server that hosts an image of Mario. If previewed on Discord it will look normal, but when opened in a browser it will be creepier and have the users IP address.

projects.title: ETT
projects.description: An online UNO card game made with Unity. Supports up to 9 players over internet and has Discord rich presence.
